content:
We're planning to publish a 2019 roadmap as the current IDEs and Editors team under Dev Tools team and so it'd be good to also mention the 2.0 experimental working group in the context of planned things for the RLS. (https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/IDEs-and-editors-2019-planning--AXzx0hCp2M78LFM7rIykHqOcAg-dqsFI0u37UY7ai5oPZfIc)
Do you think it's a good channel to announce that or should we mention it very briefly and say that we'll reveal more details in a separate post?
I think it's a perfect chance for announcement.
@matklad Also any edits/suggestions to the RLS 2.0 are very welcome!
